short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instant and free natural disaster and societal risk report for your home, city or neighborhood.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Buying a home is one of the most important decisions in your life. 

The Augurisk extension provides you with valuable information on natural disaster and crime risk while browsing the top 10 real estate websites in the US, such as Zillow and Redfin.

Get detailed insights on crime, flood, hurricanes, tornadoe, snow storm, hail storms, earthquakes and wildfires risk while visiting your favorite real estate websites in the US for free.

The extension is currently in BETA. Please share any bug or feature requests by clicking on Feedback on the side menu.
